isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1995) - ENGINE CONTROL SYSTEM OVERVIEW - VEHICLE FEATURES (STANDARD) - ELECTRONIC SPEEDOMETER AND TACHOMETER PROVISIONS

svcproc.title: ELECTRONIC SPEEDOMETER AND TACHOMETER PROVISIONS
svcproc.para: The engine control system calibrates vehicle speed to 30,000 pulses/mile. Dip switches no longer need to be changed when components affecting speed calibration are changed. The new speed calibration information can be programmed through the Electronic Service Tool.
